response.overview: The small daily routines of everyday life are not as clear and obvious as one might think. The film shows the surreal side of routines that seem simple and ordinary. By abstracting details and connecting routines with themes and emotions, Liesbeth Worm gives a whole new perspective on day-to-day life. Within the five walls of boxes, everyday movements become a fascinating visual experience.
response.tagline: The small daily routines of everyday life are not as clear and obvious as one might think.
response.title: Routine
